What is Engineering Economy? Engineering economy systematic evaluation of the economic merits of proposed solutions to engineering problems Principles: Develop the alternatives Alternatives need to be identified and defined. Focus on the difference Only the differences in expected futu re outcomes among the alternatives will effect the decision. Use a consistent viewpoint Prospective outcomes should be developed from a consistent, defined viewpoint. Consider all relevant criteria (try to) Use a common unit of measure Make uncertainty explicit Uncertainty is inevitable. Identify and explore it in analyses.
